Custom gridtext richtext grob

Source: R/venndir-gridtext.R
gridtext_richtext_grob.Rd

Custom gridtext richtext grob

gridtext_richtext_grob(
  text,
  x = grid::unit(0.5, "npc"),
  y = grid::unit(0.5, "npc"),
  hjust = 0.5,
  vjust = 0.5,
  halign = hjust,
  valign = vjust,
  rot = 0,
  default.units = "npc",
  margin = grid::unit(c(0, 0, 0, 0), "pt"),
  padding = grid::unit(c(0, 0, 0, 0), "pt"),
  r = grid::unit(0, "pt"),
  align_widths = FALSE,
  align_heights = FALSE,
  name = NULL,
  gp = grid::gpar(),
  box_gp = grid::gpar(col = NA),
  vp = NULL,
  use_markdown = TRUE,
  debug = FALSE
)
